name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Node.js Engineer with 13+ years of experience in full stack development, specializing in **Node.js**, **REST APIs**, **GraphQL**, and real-time application architectures. Proficient in **React** and **React Native** for frontend development, with robust backend expertise in **Feathers.js** and database management using **Sequelize** and **PostgreSQL**. Skilled in writing comprehensive tests with **Mocha** to ensure high-performance applications.
Track record of implementing microservices and containerized solutions using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, supporting agile methodologies throughout the development lifecycle. Proven experience in the healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring compliance with HIPAA and PCI DSS standards. Strong background in automation and predictive analytics, with hands-on work in AI/ML applications utilizing **Python**.
